documentation.title: Array Declaration Spacing
documentation.standard: When an array uses keys, each key/value pair must start on a new line.

code.title: Valid: There is only one key/value pair per line.
Invalid: More than one key/value pair per line.

documentation.standard: Each item in a multi-line array must be on a new line.

code.title: Valid: Only one array item per line.
Invalid: Multiple array items in the same line.
